Module org.crudeemail
Package org.crudeemail.mail

Class MailProcess

java.lang.Object
javafx.concurrent.Service<java.lang.Void>
org.crudeemail.mail.MailProcess
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.concurrent.Worker<java.lang.Void>, javafx.event.EventTarget
public final class MailProcess
extends javafx.concurrent.Service<java.lang.Void>

MailProcess

Class that handles all MailMessage content processing. Also handles the service to load and display to the main window webView. Service is called in MainController. 2 static methods are used in MailTreeItem.
Version:
1.0

      public static boolean hasAttachments​(jakarta.mail.Message message) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, java.io.IOException
